website_summaries.verdict: This quality cowbell is suitable for a range of musical genres, but particularly Cuban and other Latin styles.
pros: Features a deep pitch and dry tone that's more versatile than some higher-pitched cowbells
This durable model is handmade from high-quality steel with precise welding and consistent metal thickness
cons: More expensive than many other models

customer_reviews.title: My "Go To" Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: As a drummer I have five cowbells and a set of chromatic cowbells in my percussion arsenal. The Latin Percussion Mambo Cowbell is hands down my favorite "go to" cowbell because of its beautiful lower tone. I own a vintage Rock model cowbell, a Deluxe Black Beauty (high pitch), a Black Beauty Senior (mid pitch) and a Salsa Cha-Cha cowbell (high pitch). if I could only afford one model cowbell out of the entire LP line up, I would definitely go with the Mambo cowbell. If you need one that is a little bit more "open" and "airier" then consider the LP Prestige cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Harley

customer_reviews.title: All the cowbell I'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Big, loud, dynamic cowbell tone. It's all the cowbell I'll ever need. I use the LP cowbell beater with this and it sounds great to my ears. Plus it's fun to play. Don't forget your stank face.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime J.

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Bell
customer_reviews.text: I went to youtube, watched a few cowbell demos and then bought this one on Amazon. It's well built and should last me forever.
customer_reviews.author: Joey The Squash

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality bell with solid sound and no overtones. LP always delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Victor W. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great deep sound
customer_reviews.text: Has a great deep loud sound that I love. Sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powlus

customer_reviews.title: the design has stood the test of time and is perfect for the Cuban styles
customer_reviews.text: This is the ubiquitous Mambo bell. As with many other typical latin percussion instruments that look to be welded and hammered up from junkyard scraps, the design has stood the test of time and is perfect for the Cuban styles.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Young

customer_reviews.title: Great cowbell! It works
customer_reviews.text: Great cowbell! It works! Do note if you wail on the cowbell it'll slightly bend near the mouth but it doesn't effect sound. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I've found this cowbell to be the best all around cowbell. Light enough to mount on my bass drum but beefy enough for rock, jazz and Latin applications!
customer_reviews.author: R. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Good for different beats/music. Can be used with a pedal, Great! Sound is awesome, mellow and steady with no overtones.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tone, cuts through the loudest of guitar amps, but still sings when hit lightly with sticks or hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Burgin

customer_reviews.title: mambo cow bell
customer_reviews.text: This cow bell is exactly what the Dr. ordered. Great tone for mambo and not too over baring. It's the perfect addition to my drum set.
customer_reviews.author: mannymiranda

customer_reviews.title: Truly good sound
customer_reviews.text: It projects well, has "the" sound, seems well built. It is better than I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo L. Moré

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cowbell
customer_reviews.text: Low-pitched and dry, this is my favorite cowbell and I use it whenever possible. It's not for everything (no percussion accessory really is) but it's a great sound to have available.
customer_reviews.author: F

product_meta.title: Latin Percussion LP229 Mambo Cowbell
product_meta.description: Lp cowbells are handmade in the USA using the same exact specifications developed by LP founder Martin Cohen 40 years ago. All LP cowbells are crafted from premium quality steel and specially developed Tooling with careful attention given to the tolerance levels. A large variety of LP bells offers different pitches and sound characteristics designed to meet all musical needs and fit into any genre. All mounted cowbells feature the famous forged eye-bolt clamp assembly with oversized wing nuts that provide secure placement on 3/8" Diameter Mounting rods with only finger tightening. The LP mambo cowbell has a sharp, raised playing surface making it an easy bell to play in a timbale set up. It has a deeper pitch and drier tone than the LP timbale cowbell.
feature_bullets: The Bell features lp’s patented Self-Aligning eye-bolt that fits 3/8” to 1/2” diameter rods
